translation.en: I'm making the Pit of Doom.
It's a deadly trap for catching really dangerous things.
translation.ja: きけんな動物をつかまえるワナをほってるの

translation.en: But not too much. I know how you guys work.
translation.ja: でも少しだけだからね
“死んだカエルのつま先”？ “姿(すがた)が消える魔法(まほう)”
これは なくていいよね
アイビー 朝ごはんよ
でも私(わたし)は見えない

translation.en: Look straight to the glass. You will not be there.
translation.ja: 鏡を見たら 私(わたし)はいない

translation.en: Hey. Pancakes sound good, or is it more of a waffles-for-the-weekend thing?
translation.ja: パンケーキかワッフルどっちがいい？

translation.en: Yes. Is that the right answer?
I guess I do need a frog.
[Travis] Bean's pit isn't gonna catch anything.
translation.ja: ビーンは何もつかまえられないよ

translation.en: [Trevor] Yeah, trapping pits are normally rectangular.
translation.ja: 落とし穴(あな)は長方形でないと
お城(しろ)作りの方が楽しいのに
さっさと家に入りなさい

translation.en: Ew, ew! Get those worms away.
Wanna help make the Pit of Doom?
translation.ja: 落とし穴(あな)をほらない？

translation.en: It's gonna be awesomer than that cave we made.
translation.ja: 昔 作った洞窟(どうくつ)よりすごいよ

translation.en: I do not play make-believe in the dirt anymore.
Well, you do play make-believe that you're a grown-up.
translation.ja: 大人ごっこしてるでしょ

translation.en: [Bean] Just because you're 12 doesn't make you the boss of me, Nancy.
translation.ja: 12さいだからって命令しないで

translation.en: -[Nancy] Little sisters are so annoying! -[Bean scoffs, grunts]
translation.ja: 妹って うっとうしい

translation.en: Leo! You have to come over after breakfast!
translation.ja: リオ あとでうちに来て

translation.en: We have to finish the Pit of Doom today, okay?
translation.ja: 落とし穴(あな)を完成させないと

translation.en: I said you have to come over after breakfast and finish the--
translation.ja: だから朝ごはんを食べたらうちに来て…

translation.en: Sorry, Mrs. Trantz. It was an accident.
translation.ja: ごめんなさい トランズさん

translation.en: Accidents are what happen when little children don't behave.
translation.ja: 走り回るからぶつかるのよ

translation.en: [gasps] Dottsy! Do not let Bernice Blue interrupt your tinkle time.
translation.ja: ドッツィ　気にせずオシッコしていいのよ

translation.en: Oh-hoo-hoo! You did it! Ooh! It's a good one too.
translation.ja: あら よくできたわね

translation.en: We don't like children. Do we, Dottsy? [gasps]
translation.ja: 子どもはきらいよねドッツィ？

translation.en: We don't because they're yucky and mucky and icky, icky, icky.
translation.ja: だって子どもはきたなくて うるさいもの

translation.en: All right, my baby. Okay, let's do this.
translation.ja: さあ 行きましょう

translation.en: [Mrs. Trantz] Just remember, I have your mother's phone number.
translation.ja: あなたの母親に言いつけるわ
ビーン 朝ごはんよ

translation.en: [Charlotte] I have to take the girls shopping later. Wanna come?
translation.ja: 買い物に行くけど 来る？

translation.en: [David] La, la, la. Were you saying something?
[Charlotte] Do you want to take the girls shopping?
translation.ja: 何か言った？ 買い物に行く？

translation.en: [David] Sorry, I can't hear you, so I probably can't help.
translation.ja: 聞こえないから行けない

translation.en: Mom, there's a place that does ear-piercing right by where we're shopping today.
translation.ja: ママ ピアスを開けてもいい？

translation.en: If Mrs. Trantz calls, it was an accident.
translation.ja: トランズさんにぶつかった

translation.en: Hey, Dad, Leo and me are going to finish the Pit of Doom today.
translation.ja: 今日 リオで落とし穴(あな)をほる
あら トランズさん

translation.en: [Mrs. Trantz on phone] She is out of control.
translation.ja: ビーンは手に負えないわ

translation.en: Do you mean my pit? The one I was digging for the tree?
translation.ja: オレがほってた穴(あな)か？

translation.en: Yes! It's in case any bears or bad guys come into our yard. They'll fall in and be trapped.
translation.ja: うちの庭に来たクマをあの落とし穴(あな)でつかまえるの

translation.en: You actually think you're gonna catch a bear? And then what?
translation.ja: ムリねつかまえてどうする気？

translation.en: I could train her and take her to this week's show-and-tell.
translation.ja: 学校のみんなに見せる

translation.en: Well, if I were you, I'd be sure to consider the standing height of your average grizzly.
translation.ja: デカいクマをつかまえるには

translation.en: So you know how deep to dig the pit.
translation.ja: 深い落とし穴(あな)をほらないと

translation.en: Yes, Bean does get distracted. -I don't know where she gets it from. -[David] Yeah!
translation.ja: ビーンは落ち着きがないだれに似(に)たのかしら

translation.en: Come on, Nancy. Show us how it's done.
That's our rule. We hear the music, and we have to dance.
translation.ja: 音楽がかかったらおどるルールだよ

translation.en: Grow up. The rules have changed.
translation.ja: ルールを変えたでしょ
サインしたの覚えてる？

translation.en: [Charlotte] Your mother never let you? Really?
[Mrs. Trantz] My mother would never have…
No name-calling, and no playing tricks.
translation.ja: “悪口を言わない” “いたずらをしない”
きたないことをしない

translation.en: Sometimes being gross on purpose is useful.
translation.ja: でも それが役立つことだってある

translation.en: You know that if you break three rules in one day, that's it.
translation.ja: １日でルールを３つ破(やぶ)ったら

translation.en: -[Charlotte] Yes. Yes. Bye. -Oh, hey, Bean. Bean. Bean.
translation.ja: ええ そうね ビーン 今日はきれいにしてなさい

translation.en: -[David] Try to stay clean today because-- -[sighs]
translation.ja: ビーン 今日はきれいにしてなさい

translation.en: You and I are taking Nancy shopping in a bit for school clothes.
translation.ja: ナンシーと服を買いに行くわよ

translation.en: -You might wanna get something too. -[Bean shouting] No!
translation.ja: あなたもほしいでしょ

translation.en: I need to find a frog.
Oh, like one for a pet?
More like one that's old and getting ready to donate his body to science and/or magic.
translation.ja: 魔法(まほう)に体を提供(ていきょう)してくれる老いたカエルよ

translation.en: [frog croaks] Oh, I'd love to donate my body to magic.
translation.ja: ボクの体を使っていいよ

translation.en: Well, um, frogs, I hear, are found outside.
translation.ja: カエルなら外にいるみたいよ

translation.en: So come and get some fresh air. Outside.
translation.ja: だから外に行きなさい

translation.en: You know, that girl across the street, she seems nice.
translation.ja: 向かいの子は いい子そうね

translation.en: Wouldn't you wanna join them? Make a new friend?
She just runs around and makes noise.
translation.ja: 走り回ってさわいでるだけだもん

translation.en: Well, why do you say that?
-[Bean] I can make more noise than you! -[indistinct shouting]
translation.ja: 声の大きさなら負けない

translation.en: Okay. But, you know, you don't even really know her yet.
translation.ja: でもビーンをよく知らないでしょ

translation.en: Who knows? You might change your mind.
One thing I do know about Bean is she has no imagination.
translation.ja: ビーンに想像力(そうぞうりょく)がないのは知ってるもん

translation.en: I tiptoed up to the edge of the Pit of Doom,
translation.ja: 死の落とし穴(あな)までこっそり近づくと

translation.en: and there was this kind of snuffling sound below.
translation.ja: 穴(あな)の底から鼻を鳴らす音が聞こえた

translation.en: At first, I thought it was Leo with a bad cold,
translation.ja: かぜを引いたリオかと思ったけど

translation.en: The only thing that's going to fall in this pit is you.
translation.ja: この穴(あな)に落ちるのは君だけだよ

translation.en: -[Bean grunts] -Hey! Watch the cleats. I have a game this afternoon.
translation.ja: やめろよ午後から試合があるんだ

translation.en: Why would you want to play something you have to stay clean for?
translation.ja: どうせ よごれるでしょ

translation.en: [Mrs. Trantz] A perfect neighborhood is one without leaves or children.
translation.ja: 住みやすい町には 落ち葉がなくて子どももいない

translation.en: Remember when it felt that easy?

translation.ja: 何の心配もなかった頃(ころ)がなつかしい

translation.en: You mean, back when we had just one kid?
-Now, two kids. -Mm. -Double the learning experience. -[Charlotte chuckles]
translation.ja: でも子どもが２人いれば学びも２倍だ

translation.en: What do you think we'll be learning about today?
translation.ja: 今日は何を学べるかしら

translation.en: -Get away from me! -[Charlotte and David scream]
Just wanna wash your uniform for you!
translation.ja: 服を洗(あら)ってあげる
また あなたの仕業なのね

translation.en: [Mrs. Trantz] Ow, ow, ow! Don't trip.
You and I have different interpretations of clean.
translation.ja: “きれい”の意味が分かってないようだな

translation.en: -[bike bell rings] -The water just washed off all the dirt.
translation.ja: 土は 洗(あら)い流したもん

translation.en: Bean, as a favor to me and my sanity,
translation.ja: ビーン 今すぐ家に入って

translation.en: go inside, take a shower, and put on something clean.
translation.ja: シャワーを浴びて着がえなさい

translation.en: Please don't make me go, Mom.
[Nancy] Mom, I think red makes my eyes pop.
translation.ja: 赤は 目が引き立つわ

translation.en: [Charlotte] What color says, "I value my education"?
translation.ja: 勉強に集中できる色は？

translation.en: Bean, don't lie on the floor.
Please, can we leave? This is taking forever.
translation.ja: 帰ろう　もう待てないよ

translation.en: I think it's gonna be night soon, which means burglars and bears.
translation.ja: もうすぐ夜になってドロボウとクマが来ると思う

translation.en: Please, I wanna get home and dig the pit before it's too late.
translation.ja: 暗くなる前に落とし穴(あな)を完成させないと
だれも手伝ってくれない

translation.en: I have an idea. Why don't you ask the new girl?
translation.ja: 向かいの子に たのめば？
アイビー？ ええ いい子そうよ
ええ いい子そうよ

translation.en: Nice is boring. She wears headbands.
translation.ja: カチューシャしてる子はつまらない

translation.en: Why do you think Ivy's boring?
Because she is. All she does is read.
translation.ja: ずっと本を読んでるもん

translation.en: At recess, Mom. She reads at recess.
Well, Ivy just moved here, Bean. She probably doesn't have friends yet.
translation.ja: 新しい学校だから友達がいないのよ

translation.en: [Charlotte] Hmm. I think this hem's a little short.

translation.ja: ビーン 何してるの 別に何もしてないよ

translation.en: Am I getting extra clothes allowance? Now that I'm not a kid anymore.
translation.ja: おこづかいをくれない？

translation.en: Oh, for the love of Betsy, just get the dang skirt!
translation.ja: もう さっさと買えばいいでしょ

translation.en: Where on Earth did you hear that?

translation.ja: おばあちゃんが言ってた

translation.en: It's just an expression. Calling someone a tightwad is rude, Bean.
translation.ja: “しみったれ”は使っちゃいけない言葉なの
ナンシーに謝(あやま)りなさい
そうよ 謝(あやま)って

translation.en: [in sing-song] I'm sorry you're such a tightwad.
translation.ja: お姉ちゃんがしみったれで残念

translation.en: can you behave for ten minutes?
translation.ja: 10分間 じっとしてなさい

translation.en: Wouldn't pierced ears look great with my hair like this?
translation.ja: このかみ型(がた)にはピアスが似合(にあ)う
ナンシーをだましてやる

translation.en: I am the ghost of Mr. Killop.
translation.ja: ワシはオバケのキロップ

translation.en: [Bean] I lived in this house until I died of bad breath and busted boils.
translation.ja: この家に住んでいたが口がくさくて死んだ

translation.en: So I haunt the bush in front of it.
translation.ja: 今は この木に取りついてる

translation.en: Or in the dark of night, icy fingers will wrap around your neck.
translation.ja: 氷のように冷たい手がお前の首をしめるぞ
私(わたし)の細くて 弱い骨(ほね)が…
だまされた　バカ姉ちゃん

translation.en: You know the rules. Three strikes, you're out.
translation.ja: あんたはルールを３つ破(やぶ)った

translation.en: Two, you tried to trick me with fake money.
translation.ja: お金で私(わたし)をだまそうとしたのは

translation.en: Three, you just lied about your arm being broken.
translation.ja: そして骨(ほね)が折れたとウソをついた

translation.en: There's four. You wiggled your butt.
translation.ja: おしりをふるのもダメだし

translation.en: But it doesn't even matter because you're already gonna face serious consequences.
translation.ja: でも もう３つ破(やぶ)ったからお仕置きは決まりね

translation.en: Oh, yeah? See if I care.
And I'm not getting consequences in my face because I'm running away.
translation.ja: 家出するからお仕置きされないもん
ママ！ 探偵(たんてい)をやとっても見つからない

translation.en: Not even if you hire a detective.
translation.ja: 探偵(たんてい)をやとっても見つからない

translation.en: I don't know. And she was reeling it into the bush,
and then I pulled her out, and she turned around, and she wiggled her butt at me…
translation.ja: 引きずり出したらおしりをふってきた

translation.en: [whispers] Follow me. Come to my backyard. If you dare.
translation.ja: 勇気があるならうちの庭に来て

translation.en: But from here on in, you have to put on this.
translation.ja: ここから先は目かくしをして
秘密(ひみつ)の通路だからよ

translation.en: Do everything I say so you won't get hurt.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)の言うとおりにすれば平気よ

translation.en: -[Ivy] Persephone, say hello to Bean. -[Persephone] Bonjour, Bean.
translation.ja: ごあいさつして こんにちは

translation.en: It's my secret garden. Did you read that book?
translation.ja: 「秘密(ひみつ)の花園」は読んだ？

translation.en: I'll bring lots of food and blankets.
I'm only running away until dinner.
It's not a puddle. It's a pond. A frog pond.
translation.ja: ちがうわ　カエルの池よ

translation.en: A pond for a guppy maybe. If I was a frog, I don't think I'd want to live there.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)がカエルならここには住みたくない

translation.en: But would you wanna die there?
[Bean] Wouldn't you get in trouble if your mom found out I was hiding here,
translation.ja: 私(わたし)をここに連れてきたとバレたら
ママに怒(おこ)られない？

translation.en: I forgot, kids like you don't get in trouble.
translation.ja: 怒(おこ)られるタイプじゃないか

translation.en: For what? Reading books? You can't get in trouble for reading.
translation.ja: 本を読んでて怒(おこ)られるわけない

translation.en: I will get in trouble, huge trouble. If I do what I wanna do.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)の好きにすれば大変なことになる
魔法(まほう)をかけたり薬を作ったりする

translation.en: Are you some kind of… witch?
translation.ja: まさか あなたは魔女(まじょ)なの？

translation.en: -You are a witch! -A witch in training.
translation.ja: 本当に魔女(まじょ)なのね 見習いよ

translation.en: Although Grandma tells me that I probably know more than some born witches.
translation.ja: でも見習い魔女(まじょ)の中でも魔法(まほう)にくわしい方だと思う
整理整とん されてるね

translation.en: I made it so there's separate places for

translation.ja: オモチャ 薬作り 読書
ねる所 着がえる所

translation.en: Oh, and this is my doll collection.
translation.ja: そして人形コレクションよ
エリーとエスメラルダ

translation.en: And this is Annie and Sophie.
I'm gonna build a pyramid to bury her in.
translation.ja: ピラミッドを造(つく)ってうめるの

translation.en: So, what spells can you do?
I just learned the spell that makes you dance forever.
translation.ja: 相手をおどらせる魔法(まほう)を学んだ

translation.en: And I'm working on a spell that makes you invisible.
translation.ja: 今は 姿(すがた)を消す魔法(まほう)を練習してる

translation.en: I would, except I need a dead frog.
translation.ja: 死んだカエルがいるの

translation.en: It'd be mean to kill a frog.
That's why I'm building a pond.
translation.ja: 自然死するのを待つために

translation.en: So, a frog will move in and die of old age.
translation.ja: カエルが住める池を作ったの
秘密(ひみつ)を知りたい？
魔女(まじょ)のローブよ

translation.en: My grandma sent it to me.
translation.ja: おばあちゃんがくれた
おばあちゃんも魔女(まじょ)？

translation.en: She says that she isn't, but I have my doubts. Hmm.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)は そうだと思ってる
“速く走る魔法(まほう)” そして魔法(まほう)のつえよ

translation.en: And you better watch out, or I'll use it on you.
translation.ja: 信じないなら魔法(まほう)をかける
死ぬまで おどらせるからね

translation.en: [gasps] You just gave me the best idea.
Let's do the spell on Nancy.
translation.ja: ナンシーに魔法(まほう)をかけよう

translation.en: She deserves it for being such a booger-head.
translation.ja: いつもイジワルだから仕返しするの

translation.en: So, a spell would be perfect.
translation.ja: それには魔法(まほう)がピッタリ

translation.en: Especially, if we made you look like a real witch.
translation.ja: まずは魔女(まじょ)らしくなってもらう
もう魔女(まじょ)だもん

translation.en: No offense, but you don't look it.
translation.ja: でも そうは見えない

translation.en: [Bean] Do you have any face paint, fake blood,
translation.ja: フェイスペイントや血のり

translation.en: Um, Bean never came in. Do you know where she is?
translation.ja: ビーンを見なかった？ 家出したと言ったでしょ

translation.en: I told you, she ran away from home.
translation.ja: 家出したと言ったでしょ

translation.en: Could you go find her, please?
[Nancy] Why? What is the point? You're not even gonna punish her.
translation.ja: 捜(さが)したって ビーンにお仕置きしないんでしょ？

translation.en: She'll be cleaning her room all afternoon. Now go find your sister.
translation.ja: 部屋をそうじさせる 捜(さが)してきて

translation.en: Fine. I wouldn't wear these anyway.
translation.ja: 分かったどうせ 私(わたし)の好みじゃない

translation.en: -Did you make them or something? -No. I didn't make them.
translation.ja: 作ったの？ 私(わたし)は作ってないわ

translation.en: [sighs] Just remember what we'll be saying in another 15 years.
Fifteen years, we'll be basking somewhere -on a wonderful beach, alone. -Ooh, I like that idea.
translation.ja: ビーチでお酒を飲みながら日光浴でしょ

translation.en: ♪ We'll be alone ♪ [both] ♪ No babies, no kids ♪
translation.ja: 子どもたちが　　巣立って二人きり

translation.en: -♪ It's happy ♪ -♪ All happy ♪ -♪ It's optimal ♪ -♪ We're good ♪
[both] ♪ No babies in the house no more ♪ ♪ No babies in the house no more ♪
translation.ja: 子どもたちが　　巣立って二人きり

translation.en: -♪ No kids, no babies ♪ -♪ I know, baby ♪
[sighs] You're going to scare Nancy to death.
translation.ja: ナンシーをこわがらせよう

translation.en: Stop running away this minute, Bean!
translation.ja: さっさと帰ってきなさい
ママがそう言ってる　早く！

translation.en: How soon can we do the spell?
translation.ja: すぐ魔法(まほう)を使える？
うん　でもミミズがいる
ミミズなら私(わたし)にまかせて

translation.en: Would that be my eye shadow?
translation.ja: 私(わたし)のアイシャドウと⸺
お向かいのね 知ってるわ　私(わたし)はカトリンよ

translation.en: Hi, it's nice to meet you. I'm Ivy's mom, Katrine.
translation.ja: 知ってるわ　私(わたし)はカトリンよ

translation.en: So, when did you two start playing?
We're not playing. We're on a mission.
translation.ja: 遊びじゃなくて作戦よ

translation.en: Nice is boring. I'm glad you're not nice.
translation.ja: あなたはすてきじゃなくて好き

translation.en: I'm glad you're not nice too.
This is the final warning bozo-face.
translation.ja: これが最後のチャンスよ
ママが“帰ってきなさい”と

translation.en: [Nancy] Bean, you're in so much trouble.
We can't go that way. We have to get the worms for the spell before Nancy sees us.
translation.ja: ナンシーにバレないようにミミズを取りに行こう

translation.en: -But there's no way out there. -[Nancy] Bean?

translation.ja: 秘密(ひみつ)の通路が好きでしょ？
なら 教えてあげる

translation.en: No one will see this passageway to my house.
translation.ja: だれにも見られず私(わたし)の家まで行ける

translation.en: [Bean] There are 12 houses in Pancake Court,
translation.ja: パンケーキ地区にある⸺

translation.en: and I have discovered a secret passageway through all of them.
translation.ja: 12件(けん)の家を通り抜(ぬ)けられる道があるの

translation.en: Follow me, and we can get from your backyard
translation.ja: だれにも見られずにあなたの家から

translation.en: to the Pit of Doom undetected.
translation.ja: 死の落とし穴(あな)まで行ける

translation.en: There we will get the worms, sneak up on Nancy, and do the spell.
translation.ja: ミミズを手に入れてナンシーに仕返ししよう
“フェスター” 私(わたし)は“無人地帯”と呼(よ)んでる 私(わたし)は“無人地帯”と呼(よ)んでる

translation.en: [Ivy] Sergeant Bean, there are mines ahead. How do we proceed?
translation.ja: ビーン軍曹(ぐんそう) 地雷(じらい)だらけです
私(わたし)の足あとを踏(ふ)んで進みなさい

translation.en: [Ivy] Stay with me, Bean. Stay with me.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)から離(はな)れないで

translation.en: Who's the worst possible person who could live here?
translation.ja: 最悪の敵(てき)といえば だれ？
まさに最大の敵(てき)ね
すごく なわばり意識(いしき)が強い
そして子どもを食べる
さあ おいしい子どもたち もっと おいしくしてあげる

translation.en: Oh! Look at what's cooking in my pot.
translation.ja: なべの中を見てごらん

translation.en: -[Dottsy growls] -Dottsy, we're going to eat well tonight.
translation.ja: ドッツィ 今夜はごちそうね
子ども入りのスープよ

translation.en: [both in unison] I don't like being soup.
We better keep moving before she sees us.
translation.ja: バレる前に ここを出よう

translation.en: The way out is behind that statue.
translation.ja: この庭の出口はあの銅像(どうぞう)の後ろにある

translation.en: -You've got the frog. Do the spell. -[Dottsy barking]
Hurry! She's going to see us!

translation.ja: 花びらがない 急いで

translation.en: [Bean] Oh, Dottsy. Don't eat the frog.
You two. You stay right there. Right there.
translation.ja: あなたたち 動かないで

translation.en: Who else could it be except for… you. Whatever you are.
translation.ja: やっぱりまた… あなたは？
アイビーよ　私(わたし)は…

translation.en: Well, "Ivy," do you know anything about trespassing?
translation.ja: 不法侵入(ふほうしんにゅう)について知ってる？

translation.en: Your friend Bernice does not seem to.
translation.ja: ビーンは知らないわね
ごめんなさい　急いでた

translation.en: Hmm. I don't think you're sorry at all.
Though you will be because there are consequences for coming uninvited into other people's yards.
translation.ja: お仕置きを受けて反省してもらうわ

translation.en: -Ew, ew! Poo on you. -[Bean groans] [Mrs. Trantz] I feel sick.
I think I might throw up.
Yes, that's the emergency I was telling you about.
translation.ja: ほら だから急いでたの

translation.en: You… [groans] both come in the house while I call-- [groans]
translation.ja: 親に電話するから家に入って…

translation.en: Go! Run! Out of my yard! Now!
translation.ja: 今すぐ ここから出ていきなさい
アイビー 最高だった
あの二人は仲間にも敵(てき)にもなりえる
ピラミッドも造(つく)るの？

translation.en: Did you take all of my dirt? You can't have all of it.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)の土を全部 取ったでしょ

translation.en: This is Ivy, by the way.
Ivy, this is Travis and Trevor. They're twins.
translation.ja: トラビスとトレバーだよ

translation.en: But it's important that you respond to us as individuals.
translation.ja: ふたごだけど別々の人間だからね

translation.en: -Bye, Travis. Bye, Trevor. -Bye, Travis. Bye, Trevor.
translation.ja: 帰るね さようなら

translation.en: As soon as you go through, watch out for the Pit of Doom.
translation.ja: ここを通ったら落とし穴(あな)に気をつけて⸺

translation.en: And crawl along the fence to the playhouse,
so we can figure out whether it's safe or not to get the worms.
translation.ja: そこから安全かを確認(かくにん)しよう

translation.en: Nancy might be watching, so stay low.
translation.ja: ナンシーにバレないように姿勢(しせい)を低くね

translation.en: And yes, we do build pyramids.
translation.ja: ボクたちピラミッドも造(つく)るよ

translation.en: Did you want one with smooth sides or with steps?
translation.ja: 三角形か 階段(かいだん)かどっちがいい？

translation.en: [Nancy] I've looked everywhere, Mom! Bean's vanished.
translation.ja: ママ ビーンはどこにもいない

translation.en: So, the first thing we do is get the worms,
translation.ja: まず ミミズを手に入れてから

translation.en: then figure out a way to creep up on Nancy.
translation.ja: ナンシーに近づく方法を考える
“永遠(えいえん)におどらせる魔法(まほう)”よ
“ミミズのようにクネクネおどれ”

translation.en: Just say the magic words and throw the worms. It's pretty simple.
translation.ja: 呪文(じゅもん)を唱えたらミミズを投げつける

translation.en: Okay, so how many worms, exactly?
translation.ja: 分かった ミミズは 何匹(なんびき)いるの？

translation.en: I just saw worms here. This is a worm place. [groans]
translation.ja: さっき ここにミミズがいたのに

translation.en: Speak to us, oh, wiggly worms.
translation.ja: クネクネ動くミミズたちよ
かくれている場所を教えたまえ
アイビーミミズと話せるなんてすごい

translation.en: Did I ever mention how much Nancy hates worms?
translation.ja: ナンシーはミミズが大きらい

translation.en: and they can regenerate parts of their bodies.
translation.ja: 体を再生(さいせい)できるんだもん

translation.en: -[David] And we got lots of tomatoes… -[gasps] …corn, zucchini.
translation.ja: トマトやトウモロコシを育ててる

translation.en: Dad's coming. Hide in the jungle!
translation.ja: パパだジャングルにかくれて！

translation.en: [David] Over here, I'd try to plant something new.
And this year was corn and--
Yeah, yeah, yeah. You'd be surprised at how quickly they grow.
translation.ja: 成長の早さにはおどろかされるよ
これが…　オレの畑だ
それかクマの仕業かも

translation.en: I've heard tell there's a grizzly problem out here.
translation.ja: この辺りはクマが出るらしい

translation.en: My dad invites everyone over for vegetables.
translation.ja: パパはみんなに畑を見せてる

translation.en: My mom says that he has a green thumb. But I've checked a bunch of times, and it looks normal to me.
translation.ja: パパの指は緑らしいけど私(わたし)には そうは見えない

translation.en: …aspect of life. I don't make the rules.
translation.ja: まったく しょうがないな

translation.en: I don't know why kids have to run through the garden.
translation.ja: なぜ子どもたちは畑に入ったんだ

translation.en: [Katrine] That is way more fun than running through the yard.
translation.ja: 庭を走るより楽しいのよ

translation.en: [whispers] Guess what? I just thought of how we can sneak up on Nancy.
translation.ja: このままナンシーに近づこう

translation.en: Stay out of my string beans, bears,
translation.ja: クマたち 今度 畑に入ったらつかまえるからな

translation.en: or be ready to face show-and-tell.
translation.ja: 今度 畑に入ったらつかまえるからな
（あぶないから私についてきて）

translation.en: Move like a shadow. Move like a ghost. Move like a ninja.
translation.ja: （かげやオバケニンジャみたいに動くの）

translation.en: You should probably take some tomatoes, too.

translation.ja: うれしい ドッツィを見なかった？
ドッツィを見なかった？

translation.en: He's having a moment in my tomatoes.
translation.ja: あそこで用を足してる

translation.en: Dottsy, did you chase those bad little girls?
translation.ja: あの子たちを追ってきたの？

translation.en: -Have you met Mrs. Trantz? -[Mrs. Trantz babbling]

translation.ja: ないわ トランズさんは…
ユニークね ああ そうなんだ

translation.en: That's so weird. Nancy never cries.
Maybe she's sad because you ran away, and it's all her fault.
translation.ja: 妹が家出して反省してるのかも

translation.en: [sighs] Maybe she's sorry for being mean. And for never playing with me anymore.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)と遊ばなくなったことを悪く思ってるのかな

translation.en: I bet she wishes she was a better sister.
translation.ja: 今までのことを反省して⸺

translation.en: Now she just sits by the window waiting for your return.
translation.ja: あなたの帰りを待ってるのよ

translation.en: I wouldn't mind a sister like that.
I must find her and bring her home! [sobs]
translation.ja: 見つけて家に連れ帰らないと
ナンシー 止めてもムダよ
すべて私(わたし)のせいなんだから

translation.en: We agree. It is your fault.
translation.ja: そのとおり　あなたのせいよ

translation.en: You should search for the rest of your life to find your sweet… [bawling]
translation.ja: これから一生をかけてかわいい妹を捜(さが)し続けなさい
だれよりもやさしくてかけがえのない妹なんだから

translation.en: [sighs] Maybe we shouldn't do the spell.
translation.ja: 魔法(まほう)はやめよう

translation.en: [sighs] It's probably not fun to dance forever.
translation.ja: 足が血だらけになるまで

translation.en: And not stop until your feet are bloody stumps.
translation.ja: おどり続けるのは楽しくないよね

translation.en: Even some of Bean's stupid friends.
translation.ja: ビーンの友達も開けてる

translation.en: We've discussed this a million times, Nancy. You'll get them when you're 13.
translation.ja: 13さいになってからと何度も言ってるでしょ

translation.en: She's not crying about me. She's crying about having her ears pierced.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)じゃなくてピアスのことで泣いてたんだ

translation.en: You're a booger-head! You know that?
translation.ja: やっぱりサイテーだね

translation.en: Booger-heads don't wear earrings! Booger-heads just wear boogers!
translation.ja: ピアスより鼻くそがお似合(にあ)いだよ
もう にげられない

translation.en: Stop! I command you to leave Bean alone!
translation.ja: ビーンから離(はな)れなさい

translation.en: I hope you're ready to dance forever!
translation.ja: 一生 おどり続けてもらう
あなたは おしまいよ

translation.en: Are you pretending to be some sort of… witch?
translation.ja: 魔女(まじょ)ごっごをしてるの？

translation.en: She is a witch. A witch-in-training.
translation.ja: 本物の見習い魔女(まじょ)だもん

translation.en: "Dance and squiggle, worm a-wiggle, long as you live, you'll always jiggle!"
translation.ja: “ミミズのようにクネクネと死ぬまで おどり続けろ”
どうしよう　すごくこわい

translation.en: Stop making fun of my friend.
translation.ja: 友達をバカにしないで

translation.en: I thought you said she's the boring girl who wears headbands and reads at recess.
translation.ja: カチューシャをつけたつまらない子でしょ？
一生 おどり続けろ！

translation.en: Stop it! Get them off of me! Get them off!
translation.ja: やめて　ミミズを取って

translation.en: [Bean] Oh no. I'm out of worms.
I am going to kill you!
translation.ja: ぜったいにゆるさない
魔法(まほう)が効(き)いてる

translation.en: -[barking] -Dottsy, no. Stay away from those terrible children.
translation.ja: ドッツィ こっちへ来なさい

translation.en: [Mrs. Trantz] Get me out of this pit!
translation.ja: この穴(あな)から出して

translation.en: [Trevor] Look! Bean's pit did catch something.
translation.ja: 何かつかまえたみたい

translation.en: No dessert and no TV for a week?
translation.ja: １週間 テレビ禁止(きんし)？

translation.en: If that's what consequences are, it's not too, too bad.
translation.ja: それがお仕置きなら悪くないね

translation.en: I don't think your mom was that mad.
translation.ja: ビーンのママ 笑ってたね

translation.en: [Charlotte] Nancy, come on. Baby, come on.
And Dad didn't seem too mad either.
translation.ja: パパも怒(おこ)ってなかった

translation.en: Upsidaisy. You've had quite the day.
translation.ja: よいしょ 今日は大変だね

translation.en: Yeah, just give me a little boost here.
Use your legs. Yeah, use your legs. There you go.
I knew the pit would catch something, but how come Nancy stopped dancing?
translation.ja: なぜナンシーはおどらなくなったのかな？
魔法(まほう)は永遠(えいえん)でしょ？

translation.en: Yeah, but we didn't have 20 worms, so it only half worked.
translation.ja: ミミズが足りてなかったもん

translation.en: [sighs] We'll have to do it again.
What if we do the dancing spell on Mrs. Trantz?
translation.ja: トランズさんをおどらせるのはどう？

translation.en: We can do it on the people who keep the dog in the Poopy Yard.
translation.ja: ウンチだらけの庭でね

translation.en: Imagine if they had to dance forever around poop!
translation.ja: ウンチの周りで永遠(えいえん)におどらせよう

translation.en: Excuse me, but your plans for tomorrow may not include
translation.ja: でも明日はおとなしくしてなさい

translation.en: spells on neighbors, terrorizing your sister,
translation.ja: だれかに魔法(まほう)をかけるのも

translation.en: dog poop, worms, or Pits of Doom. Is that clear?
translation.ja: ミミズや落とし穴(あな)で遊ぶのもダメ

translation.en: It's almost time for supper. Do you wanna walk Ivy home?
translation.ja: アイビーを家まで送る？

translation.en: [Bean] You know what's so weird? I did use to think you were boring.
translation.ja: あなたはつまらない子だと思ってた

translation.en: I thought all you ever did was read.
translation.ja: 本しか読まないのかと

translation.en: I thought all you ever did was run around making noise.
translation.ja: あなたは走り回ってさわがしいだけかと

translation.en: Do you really not like headbands?
translation.ja: カチューシャがきらい？
負けたけど楽しかった
トイレにオバケがいる

translation.en: Sometimes it's easier to feel the ghost.
translation.ja: オバケを感じる方が簡単(かんたん)

translation.en: It's like a cold wind passing right through you.
translation.ja: 冷たい風が通りすぎるからね

translation.en: I am honored to welcome you to curriculum night.
translation.ja: 保護者会(ほごしゃかい)へようこそ！

translation.en: [Nancy] You can bet she's up to something nefarious.

translation.ja: 許可証(きょかしょう)を見せなさい
こんにちは 子どもたち

translation.en: ♪ Tell me the things you let me know ♪ ♪ No need to rush, we'll take it slowly ♪
♪ The difference in us is hard to prove ♪ ♪ Guess I just have to get To know you, but… ♪
Oh, it looks like I'm crying.
♪ So why won't we stay for a while? ♪
translation.ja: シャーロット デービッド

translation.en: -♪ I think we do get along just right ♪ -[speaking indistinctly]
translation.ja: ダンスは得意(とくい)だ カトリン

translation.en: -♪ So why won't we stay for a while? ♪ -[chuckling]
♪ Not too far There's a place just for us two ♪
